settings.heading: Recipes for All Tastes & Occasions
settings.paragraph: Cooking for a vegetarian or vegan, preparing for a birthday party, or needing tasty braai ideas and inspiration for imaginative sides? You will find just what you need in Ina Paarman’s Kitchen recipe library: recipes that cater to all skill levels, taste preferences, and time and budget constraints.

settings.review_text: This book annoys me. I have just one copy, and I cannot decide whether it should be kept on the coffee table, by the stove, or by my bed. It is that good.
The perfect present for any foodie, both young and old.
For every one of us who does cook, sometimes we forget there are 10 who don’t know how. [Ina] Paarman has included some step-by-step instructions with photographs in this book.
